name: ava-sdk-js
description: A JavaScript/TypeScript SDK designed to simplify integration with Ava Protocolâ€™s AVS
author: Vinh Nguyen (https://github.com/v9n), Chris Li (https://github.com/chrisli30)

scripts.gen-protoc: curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AvaProtocol/EigenLayer-AVS/main/protobuf/avs.proto > grpc_codegen/avs.proto && grpc_tools_node_protoc --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:./grpc_codegen/ --grpc_out=grpc_js:./grpc_codegen/ --proto_path=./grpc_codegen avs.proto && mv ./grpc_codegen/avs_pb.js ./grpc_codegen/avs_pb.js && mv ./grpc_codegen/avs_grpc_pb.js ./grpc_codegen/avs_grpc_pb.js && rm -f ./grpc_codegen/temp_*
